titleStmt.title: A defence of a book intituled, The snake in the grass in reply to several answers put out to it by George Whithead, Joseph Wyeth, &c.
titleStmt.author: Leslie, Charles, 1650-1722.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Bennet for C. Brome ... W. Keblewhite ... and Geo. Strahan ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Charles Leslie. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
"A collection of several papers which relate to the fore-going discourse" (93 p. at end) has special t.p. dated 1695.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
